statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT customer_id, product_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id, product_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS num_products FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_products > 1
SELECT product_id, YEAR(feedback_date) AS year, MONTH(feedback_date) AS month, COUNT(*) AS num_feedbacks FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY product_id, year, month ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT product_name, review FROM product_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, review FROM product_reviews WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT customer_name, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT product_name, rating FROM product_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM product_reviews GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE review_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data;
SELECT product_id, customer_id, review_text, rating FROM product_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_data cd INNER JOIN customer_feedback cf ON cd.customer_id = cf.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number, product_id, rating FROM customer_data cd JOIN customer_feedback cf ON cd.customer_id = cf.customer_id JOIN product_reviews pr ON cd.customer_id = pr.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT analysis_id, sentiment_score, suggestion FROM feedback_analysis WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, city FROM customers WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score, suggestion FROM feedback_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating, date_posted FROM Reviews WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 AND description LIKE '%best%'
SELECT feedback_text, rating, date_submitted FROM Feedback JOIN Customers ON Feedback.customer_id = Customers.customer_id
SELECT service_name, description, price FROM Services WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC
